messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] labels/was:unschool math
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/28/03 12:06:22 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... If you want a label you could say you are life learners with a child in school at the moment.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/28/03 12:06:22 PM Eastern Standard Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:

> Why?
> The label shouldn't matter so much as what you know about yourself in your
> heart.
> Why would calling oneself an unschooler be so important even if you aren't
> unschooling?
> It doesn't change who you are, what your views are or anything about you to
>
> not be able to use a label.
>
>
If you want a label you could say you are life learners with a child in
school at the moment.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
